condition.title: Problem
condition.p: seems to take an abnormally long amount of time to start.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Some anti-virus software can cause Java applications, such as , to start very slowly due to scanning compressed archives (such as the JAR libraries that all Java applications use).

steps-informal.p: A possible solution is to add the folder to the list of exceptions in the anti-virus software settings.
